title: Joker Fan

fields.name: 🆔 / <:discordian:1119395375896338512>:
fields.value: Every even-numbered round at the start of your turn, you may send a Laughing Gas Tank (1688) to the table. If it is Detonated, you gain a turn of **Tipsy**.

fields.name: <:void:1119855990263775283>:
fields.value: Cards are effectless, but you gain an **Enhanced** version of every card played. All cards played here gain the <:wild:1106237191388143838> color.

fields.name: <:grave:1119394182310670366>:
fields.value: Acts as a Player Zombie (1872) with all cards it ever draws gaining the colors <:lime:1108048230542999633> + <:purple:1106247148607131711> + <:white:1107514189574045726>.

fields.name: <:inferno:1118594776716021780>:
fields.value: Can be played if a <:explosive:1171223932754473082> is played. Immediately detonate the <:explosive:1171223932754473082> and replace it with a Laughing Gas Tank (1688). If no <:explosive:1171223932754473082>, 1 player draws 2 <:gray:1107516393450127411> cards.
Get out of jail free card (2105), but you reroll any <:black:1106265022453268530> or <:red:1106234051129507932> cards in your hand.

fields.name: <:deck:1106732963577729055>:
fields.value: Appears as just a <:deck:1106732963577729055>. Double-Edged Sword (1704), but you gain 1 😃 right after playing it.

fields.name: <:enchantment:1107516323426213888>:
fields.value: Increase (2082), but attacking cards cause the player to gain 1 **Card Shard** 🔹.

fields.name: <:weapon:1107519313075785768>:
fields.value: Tranquilizer (1556), but they draw an **Ethereal** card every time **Tipsy** skips their turn.

fields.name: <:bones:1118750770133737565>:
fields.value: All cards in your graveyard also remove 1 **Card Shard**.

desc:
Post 2440
- Gain 1 **Happy** 😃 upon drawing this card.
